name: SpaceRoma: Learn Japanese Characters Hiragana and Katakana
name_original: SpaceRoma: Learn Japanese Characters Hiragana and Katakana
description:
An educational mini game to help you learn Japanese characters Hiragana and Katakana.

Type out the Romaji corresponding to the characters on the spaceship. 

Defeat all enemies as you progress through the entire Japanese alphabet.

(Download PC version for better experience)

Credits
